page.title: 03SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: There is only one primary school in the area and it is a small two-teacher school with 47 pupils.The school is called{Evish Primary School}and all the pupils are from the surrounding area.There are only 2 rooms and 1 room has primary 1 to primary 3 and the other has primary 4 to primary 7. The teachers therefore have a number of classes to teach at the same time.At present many small schools like this are threatened with closure. Most of the local children attend primary schools in nearby Strabane and most of these children,and those attending Secondary School,travel by buses of the local{Education Authority as there are no other bus services.
